title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Through Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) and Mobile Messenger Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can efficiently receive and engage with weekly language learning content using the Telegram app.

Learners perform ≥5 language use scenarios in three job situations (negotiation, customer service, team collaboration) using simulation/VR environments (e.g., virtual meeting rooms) and mobile messengers (Slack, Zoom Chat, etc.) within one week, and submit practical reports meeting ≥2 of 3 evaluation checklist items (clarity, appropriateness, responsiveness) per scenario
Participants can improve language proficiency based on formative assessment feedback in a low-cost technological environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
